## R Resources

[Swirl](http://swirlstats.com) Learn R, in R!

[Introductory R tutorial](http://www.cyclismo.org/tutorial/R/)

[DataCamp's Intro to R course](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/free-introduction-to-r) **FREE!**

[Try R from Code School](http://tryr.codeschool.com/levels/1/challenges/2) **Also free!**

[R Tutorial](http://www.r-tutor.com/r-introduction)

[R Tutorial from tutorialspoint](https://www.tutorialspoint.com/r/)

Note, you can also access R tutorials on [lynda.com](https://www.lynda.com), which you can access for free from anywhere on the Emory campus.

[Data journalism with R](https://rddj.info)

[RStudio cheat sheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/)

[R data import/export](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-data.html)



[R for Data Science](http://r4ds.had.co.nz)
